generated_doNotEdit.title: Mingle Behavior
generated_doNotEdit.description: Allows an entity to go to the village bell and mingle with other entities

fields.title: Cooldown Time
fields.description: Time in seconds the mob has to wait before using the goal again

fields.title: Duration
fields.description: Amount of time in seconds that the entity will chat with another entity

fields.title: Mingle Distance
fields.description: The distance from its partner that this entity will mingle. If the entity type is not the same as the entity, this value needs to be identical on both entities.

fields.title: Mingle Partner Type
fields.description: The entity type that this entity is allowed to mingle with

fields.title: Speed Multiplier
fields.description: Movement speed multiplier of the mob when using this AI Goal

fields.title: Priority
fields.description: As priority approaches 0, the priority is increased. The higher the priority, the sooner this behavior will be executed as a goal.
